name: Tabsys
tag_list: data-analysis, data, assessment, observation, sas, ios, android, education, industry, hr, observational-assessment
overview:
Tabsys aims to become the leading provider of systems that allow clients to record, measure and analyse observations anywhere anytime.

Tabsys is able to streamline our clients’ observational procedures across many industries and professions such as education, policing, military, medicine, customer service, machine operators, field engineers and sales, in many cases providing substantial operational cost savings.

Recent innovations in technology have presented the interface for recording observations anywhere and with great flexibility. The evolution of widely available and affordable tablet devices offers many advantages over conventional paper based or PC based recording techniques.

The recording device interfaces with cloud-based technology, storing and organising all relevant data and providing a content management system to create, deploy and analyse assessments.

We’re very aware of the power in the data being produced across numerous differing business sectors, demographics and regions. Consequently, Tabsys is harnessing a base set of analytic technologies and techniques to produce real insight into chosen data sets of collected assessments. This will enable the cost effective use of business intelligence tools providing valuable business insights previously unnoticed and at speed.
